control.control:
0 140 !ListItem.IsCollection
1120 100 750 35 primal_20_Title $VAR[ColorFontNormal] $VAR[ColorFontShadow] $VAR[ColorFontSelected] left center $INFO[ListItem.Label] !String.IsEqual(ListItem.label,..)
1120 100 750 35 primal_20_Title $VAR[ColorFontNormal] $VAR[ColorFontShadow] $VAR[ColorFontSelected] left center $LOCALIZE[210] String.IsEqual(ListItem.label,..) >
1120 150 750 45 primal_15 $VAR[ColorFontSelected] $VAR[ColorFontShadow] $VAR[ColorFontSelected] true left center $VAR[ExtendedInfoWriter]$VAR[ExtendedInfoDirector, / ] !String.IsEqual(ListItem.label,..)
1120 185 750 45 primal_15 $VAR[ColorFontSelected] $VAR[ColorFontShadow] $VAR[ColorFontSelected] true left center $VAR[ExtendedInfoRatingAndVotes] !String.IsEqual(ListItem.label,..)
Movie Plot 1120 240 750 330 primal_16 justify $VAR[ColorFontShadow] [COLOR $VAR[ColorFontNormal]]$VAR[ExtendedInfoPlot][/COLOR] !Skin.HasSetting(NoPlotScroll) !String.IsEqual(ListItem.label,..)
1120 600 horizontal VideoCodecFlaggingConditions AudioCodecFlaggingConditions AspectCodecFlaggingConditions
